name: SPACE DUDES vs ALIEN DUDES
description:
SPACE DUDES vs ALIEN DUDES

Alien Dudes are attacking the Base, It's up to the Space Dudes to Stop Them !

Play Across Many Maps and Game Modes to Win the Day !

You can View it in 1st or 3rd Person Mode.

Go it Alone or Team up with Your A.I. Squad.
(Don't forget to set the Number of BOTS in the Main Menu)

Up to 16 Members on Each Team.

You can set the Challenge Level of the Enemies.

Several Game Modes, Including . . .

TEAM DEATHMATCH
Kill the Enemy Team Members to Get Points

CAPTURE THE FLAG
Get the Enemy Flag and Bring it back to Your Base

CONQUEST
Control the Objectives over Time

RUSH
Destroy or Defend the Objectives

KILL CONFIRMED
Collect Enemy Dogtags to earn points

FREE FOR ALL
Kill Everyone Else

Here are some more of the gameplay features and content You can expect . . .

- You and Your team of A.I. BOTS can battle the Aliens in many different Game Mode Types

- 1st or 3rd Person View Mode

- You can set the Number of BOTS in the Main Menu

- Up to 16 Members on Each Team.

- You can set the A.I. Level of the Enemies.

- Challenge Yourself in the Following Game Types . . .
TEAM DEATHMATCH, CAPTURE THE FLAG, CONQUEST, RUSH, KILL CONFIRMED and FREE FOR ALL
